dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I’m calling because my phone bill has incorrect charges again. Why does this keep happening?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’m sorry to hear that, Mr. Miller. Let me pull up your account and take a look.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: This is the third month in a row! I shouldn’t have to keep calling you.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I completely understand your frustration. I’ll get this fixed right away.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You said that last time too, and yet here we are.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You’re absolutely right, and I’ll also make sure it doesn’t happen again.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: What exactly are these charges for?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I see here it’s for international calls. Were you traveling last month?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: No! I’ve never made an international call on this line.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Understood. I’ll review the call logs to confirm and remove any incorrect charges.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: How long will this take? I have a meeting in 10 minutes.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: We should be able to resolve it before then. I’m already checking.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: And what about the previous months? Will you refund those too?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Yes, I’ll check the past two statements and adjust them as needed.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Why does this system even allow wrong charges to appear?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: There can sometimes be routing errors. We’re working to improve it.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: That’s not good enough. I’ve wasted hours on this already.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I hear you. I’ll also apply a goodwill credit for your inconvenience.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: How much?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I can offer you a $25 credit on top of the refunds.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: It should be more, given how much time I’ve spent.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Let me speak to my supervisor about increasing the credit.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Fine. I’m waiting.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you for holding. I was able to get approval for a $50 credit.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: That’s better. Make sure it shows up on my next bill.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Absolutely. I’ll email you a confirmation today as well.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You said that before, and it never came.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I apologize. I’m sending it as soon as we end this call.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: And the wrong charges are being removed?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Yes, I’ve already processed the adjustments for the past three months.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay. But how do I know it won’t happen again?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’ve also placed a monitoring flag on your account to prevent this in the future.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Good. I expect no more mistakes.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Understood. I’ll personally follow up with you next month to make sure everything is correct.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I’ll hold you to that.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I appreciate your patience, Mr. Miller. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: No. Just fix it.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: It’s all taken care of. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to resolve this. Have a great day.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: We’ll see.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Take care, Mr. Miller. Goodbye.
